meta.title: From CANNIBAL to BUTLER
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: It's Blood on the Clocktower Week. ([See Day 1's note](https://raddle.quest/2025/05/19).) Today we honor the [Cannibal](https://wiki.bloodontheclocktower.com/Cannibal), a character who waits for characters to die and then subsumes their powers. The [Butler](https://wiki.bloodontheclocktower.com/Butler)'s powers aren't useful to take on, but the Cannibal doesn't get a choice; they just eat whatever corpse comes along. That's how the game goes sometimes.
